payload.content: OpenAI's Codex and Anthropic's Claude represent fundamentally different approaches to AI agents, despite being released close in time.

name: OpenAI's Codex and Anthropic's Claude represent fundamentally different approach
content: OpenAI's Codex and Anthropic's Claude represent fundamentally different approaches to AI agents, despite being released close in time.

payload.content: Codex's philosophy is 'autonomous correctness,' focusing on an agent that can be handed a task and left to complete it independently.

name: Codex's philosophy is 'autonomous correctness,' focusing on an agent that can be
content: Codex's philosophy is 'autonomous correctness,' focusing on an agent that can be handed a task and left to complete it independently.

payload.content: Claude's philosophy is 'integration and coordination,' emphasizing agents that work together and integrate into existing workflows.

name: Claude's philosophy is 'integration and coordination,' emphasizing agents that w
content: Claude's philosophy is 'integration and coordination,' emphasizing agents that work together and integrate into existing workflows.

payload.content: The three-layer orchestrator architecture in AI agents enables 'hand-it-off-and-walk-away' work, suggesting a high degree of autonomy.

name: The three-layer orchestrator architecture in AI agents enables 'hand-it-off-and-
content: The three-layer orchestrator architecture in AI agents enables 'hand-it-off-and-walk-away' work, suggesting a high degree of autonomy.

payload.content: Agent Teams with peer-to-peer messaging are designed for interdependent problems, where multiple agents coordinate to achieve a goal.

name: Agent Teams with peer-to-peer messaging are designed for interdependent problems
content: Agent Teams with peer-to-peer messaging are designed for interdependent problems, where multiple agents coordinate to achieve a goal.

payload.content: The 'meta-skill of evaluating new capabilities' is a durable advantage in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

name: The 'meta-skill of evaluating new capabilities' is a durable advantage in the ra
content: The 'meta-skill of evaluating new capabilities' is a durable advantage in the rapidly evolving AI landscape.

payload.content: For knowledge workers, choosing between AI agents like Codex and Claude should be based on whether the problem is 'delegation-shaped' (suited for autonomous agents) or 'coordination-shaped' (suited for integrated agent teams), rather than which tool is inherently 'better'.

name: For knowledge workers, choosing between AI agents like Codex and Claude should b
content: For knowledge workers, choosing between AI agents like Codex and Claude should be based on whether the problem is 'delegation-shaped' (suited for autonomous agents) or 'coordination-shaped' (suited for integrated agent teams), rather than which tool is inherently 'better'.
